name: Document Guideline Compliance Check
description: Run compliance checks over marketing documents with established or custom metrics

appStages.name: Introduction
Check Compliance
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eCheck Document Compliance\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \n  \u003csection\u003e\n    \u003ch4\u003eSteps\u003c/h4\u003e\n    \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Upload a Marketing Document in PDF or readable text format\u003c/li\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003e Hit \u0027Submit\u0027 to start the compliance check (default metrics will be used)\u003c/li\u003e\n    \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \u003c/section\u003e\n  \n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "customClass": "border rounded p-4 m-4",
      "key": "fieldSet",
      "type": "fieldset",
      "label": "Field Set",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "components": [
        {
          "label": "Compliance Threshold (Lower Limit)",
          "tableView": true,
          "defaultValue": "0.9",
          "key": "compliantThreshold01",
          "type": "textfield",
          "input": true
        },
        {
          "label": "Columns",
          "columns": [
            {
              "components": [],
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "size": "md",
              "currentWidth": 6,
              "width": 6
            },
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "Select Options",
                  "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
                  "inline": false,
                  "hidden": true,
                  "hideLabel": true,
                  "tableView": false,
                  "defaultValue": 2,
                  "values": [
                    {
                      "label": "Use existing document",
                      "value": "1",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    },
                    {
                      "label": "Upload new document",
                      "value": "2",
                      "shortcut": ""
                    }
                  ],
                  "clearOnHide": false,
                  "key": "selectOptions",
                  "type": "radio",
                  "input": true
                }
              ],
              "size": "md",
              "width": 6,
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "currentWidth": 6
            },
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "HTML",
                  "attrs": [
                    {
                      "attr": "",
                      "value": ""
                    }
                  ],
                  "content": "\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px;margin-left:-2pxpx;\"\u003eHuman Validation Threshold (Lower Limit)\u003c/h4\u003e",
                  "refreshOnChange": false,
                  "hidden": true,
                  "key": "html11",
                  "type": "htmlelement",
                  "input": false,
                  "tableView": false
                },
                {
                  "label": "Human Validation Threshold (Lower Limit)",
                  "hidden": true,
                  "hideLabel": true,
                  "disabled": true,
                  "tableView": true,
                  "clearOnHide": false,
                  "calculateValue": "value \u003d parseFloat((data[\"compliantThreshold01\"] - 0.15).toFixed(2))",
                  "key": "humanValidationThreshold01",
                  "type": "textfield",
                  "input": true
                },
                {
                  "label": "HTML",
                  "attrs": [
                    {
                      "attr": "",
                      "value": ""
                    }
                  ],
                  "content": "\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px;margin-left:-2pxpx;\"\u003eNon-Compliant Threshold (Upper Limit)\u003c/h4\u003e",
                  "refreshOnChange": false,
                  "hidden": true,
                  "key": "html12",
                  "type": "htmlelement",
                  "input": false,
                  "tableView": false
                },
                {
                  "label": "Non-Compliant Threshold (Upper Limit)",
                  "hidden": true,
                  "hideLabel": true,
                  "disabled": true,
                  "tableView": true,
                  "clearOnHide": false,
                  "calculateValue": "value \u003dparseFloat((data[\"humanValidationThreshold01\"]).toFixed(2))",
                  "key": "nonCompliantThreshold",
                  "type": "textfield",
                  "input": true
                }
              ],
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "size": "md",
              "currentWidth": 6,
              "width": 6
            }
          ],
          "key": "columns5",
          "type": "columns",
          "input": false,
          "tableView": false
        },
        {
          "label": "Columns",
          "columns": [
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "Columns",
                  "columns": [
                    {
                      "components": [
                        {
                          "label": "HTML",
                          "attrs": [
                            {
                              "attr": "",
                              "value": ""
                            }
                          ],
                          "content": "\u003ch4 style\u003d\"color: #3178d6; font-size: 20px;margin-left:-2pxpx;font-weight: 400;\"\u003ePreview Marketing Documents\u003c/h4\u003e",
                          "refreshOnChange": false,
                          "key": "html8",
                          "type": "htmlelement",
                          "input": false,
                          "tableView": false
                        },
                        {
                          "label": "HTML",
                          "tag": "div",
                          "className": "mb-3",
                          "attrs": [
                            {
                              "attr": "",
                              "value": ""
                            }
                          ],
                          "content": "\u003cimg src\u003d\"data:image/png;base64,\u003d\u003d\"\u003e\n\u003ch5 style\u003d\"display:inline-block;vertical-align:text-top;color:#0033CC;\"\u003e\u003cstrong\u003ePreview Marketing Documents\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/h5\u003e",
                          "refreshOnChange": false,
                          "customClass": "font-manrope",
                          "hidden": true,
                          "key": "html6",
                          "type": "htmlelement",
                          "input": false,
                          "tableView": false
                        }
                      ],
                      "width": 10,
                      "offset": 0,
                      "push": 0,
                      "pull": 0,
                      "size": "md",
                      "currentWidth": 10
                    },
                    {
                      "components": [
                        {
                          "label": "Refresh",
                          "action": "event",
                          "showValidations": false,
                          "theme": "success",
                          "leftIcon": "fa fa-lg fa-refresh",
                          "customClass": "btn-outline btn-abs-top-0 btn-icon-30",
                          "tableView": false,
                          "key": "refresh",
                          "properties": {
                            "for": "fileList"
                          },
                          "type": "button",
                          "event": "refreshFile",
                          "input": true
                        }
                      ],
                      "width": 2,
                      "offset": 0,
                      "push": 0,
                      "pull": 0,
                      "size": "md",
                      "currentWidth": 2
                    }
                  ],
                  "key": "columns3",
                  "conditional": {
                    "show": true,
                    "when": "selectOptions",
                    "eq": "2"
                  },
                  "type": "columns",
                  "input": false,
                  "tableView": false
                },
                {
                  "label": "Table",
                  "cellAlignment": "left",
                  "customClass": " rounded p-",
                  "bordered": true,
                  "condensed": true,
                  "key": "fileList",
                  "properties": {
                    "path": "C:/Users/NMBR/kks1/apps/",
                    "pathComponent": "destinationPath"
                  },
                  "conditional": {
                    "show": true,
                    "when": "selectOptions",
                    "eq": "2"
                  },
                  "type": "table",
                  "numRows": 1,
                  "numCols": 2,
                  "input": false,
                  "tableView": false,
                  "rows": [
                    [
                      {
                        "components": [
                          {
                            "label": "Refresh the list",
                            "customClass": "font-manrope",
                            "disabled": true,
                            "tableView": false,
                            "defaultValue": false,
                            "key": "checkbox1",
                            "type": "checkbox",
                            "input": true
                          }
                        ]
                      },
                      {
                        "components": [
                          {
                            "label": "View",
                            "action": "event",
                            "showValidations": false,
                            "leftIcon": "fa fa-lg fa-eye",
                            "customClass": "btn-icon btn-outline",
                            "tableView": false,
                            "key": "view1",
                            "properties": {
                              "actionType": "modal"
                            },
                            "type": "button",
                            "event": "viewPdf",
                            "input": true
                          }
                        ]
                      }
                    ]
                  ]
                }
              ],
              "size": "md",
              "offset": 0,
              "push": 0,
              "pull": 0,
              "currentWidth": 6,
              "width": 6
            },
            {
              "components": [
                {
                  "label": "Upload PDF File(s)",
                  "description": "Upload a marketing document in PDF/TXT/DOCX format",
                  "tableView": false,
                  "storage": "base64",
                  "webcam": false,
                  "fileTypes": [
                    {
                      "label": "",
                      "value": ""
                    }
                  ],
                  "clearOnHide": false,
                  "validate": {
                    "required": true
                  },
                  "key": "file",
                  "conditional": {
                    "show": true,
                    "when": "selectOptions",
                    "eq": "2"
                  },
                  "type": "file",
                  "input": true
                },
                {
                  "label": "Columns",
                  "columns": [
                    {
                      "components": [],

                      "width": 1

                    {
                      "components": [

                          "label": "Upload",

                          "theme": "info",
                          "customClass": "float-right rounded",
                          "tableView": false,
                          "key": "upload",
                          "conditional": {

                            "when": "selectOptions",
                            "eq": "2"
                          },
                          "type": "button",

                      "push": 0,
                      "pull": 0,

                  "input": false,
                  "tableView": false
                },
                {
                  "label": "Destination Path",
                  "hidden": true,
                  "spellcheck": false,

                  "defaultValue": "data/GENAI/Compliance-Checking-For-Marketing-Docs/Uploads",
                  "clearOnHide": false,

          ],
          "key": "columns1",
          "type": "columns",
          "input": false,
          "tableView": false
        },
        {
          "label": "Response",
          "editor": "ckeditor",
          "tableView": true,
          "key": "genAiResponse",

        {
          "label": "Submit",

          "theme": "info",

appStages.name: Compare Guidelines
